item.title: VBS Dropper Script for Nanocore RAT. Fileless Properties.
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction This piece of malware had some fileless malware properties, but because it copied itself to disk, it cannot be categorized as fileless malware.
